scripts.elm-nuke: rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd tests && rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd ..
scripts.gen:starwars: npm run build && clear && ./bin/elm-graphql https://elm-graphql.herokuapp.com --base Swapi --output examples/src
scripts.gen:normalize_test: npm run build && cd ete_tests && ../bin/elm-graphql http://localhost:4000 --base Normalize && cd -
scripts.gen:github: npm run build && clear && ./bin/elm-graphql --introspection-file examples/github-schema.json --base Github --output examples/src
scripts.approve-compilation: cd ete_tests && elm make src/NormalizeDemo.elm --output /dev/null && cd - && cd examples && elm make --output /dev/null src/Github.elm src/Starwars.elm src/complex/Main.elm src/SimpleMutation.elm
